name: 涂淑惠
objective: 瞭解電路元件之基本特性及其組合電路之分析方法，內容包含：1.電路元件：電壓及電流源，主動元件，2.電路特性：歐姆定律，柯希荷夫電壓與電流定律等，3.一階及二階電路：電路之微分方程描述及各種輸入信號之響應，4.穩態分析與頻率響應：分析電路之頻域，5.電腦輔助電路分析：如使用 SPICE 工具。
schedule:
1.  Characteristics of Resistors, Capacitors, and Inductors
2.  Loop Analysis and Nodal Analysis
3.  Duel Networks
4.  Reciprocity Theorem and Two-Port Networks
5.  Electric Power and Maximum Power Theorem
6.  Δ-Y Transformation
7.  Thevenin Theorem and Norton Theorem
8.  Symmetric and Skewsymmetric Networks
9.  Midterm 
10. Controlled Sources and Equivalent Circuits
11. Mutual Inductance
12. Singularity Functions
13. Simple Circuit Analysis- Pure Capacitive/ Inductive Networks
14. Simple Circuit Analysis- RL/RC Circuits
15. Simple Circuit Analysis- LC Circuits
16. Simple Circuit Analysis- RLC Circuits
17. State Equations
18. Final
materials:
1. Electric Circuits (10th edition) by James W. Nilsson and Susan A. Riedel
2. Fundamentals of Electric Circuits (6th edition) by Christopher. K. Alexander and Matthew N.O. Sadiku
